title: For Sale/Trade:  AK 47, Romanian WASR 10/63, 7.62x39, Plus Extras!
postcontent:
Very nice WASR for sale!  This is NOT a WASR 10 but a 10/63 (WASR 10's are made from rejected parts, while 10/63's are made from approved military surplus parts.)  Sights are NOT canted, serial numbers match, chrome lined barrel, side scope mount rail, Tapco G2 trigger, action is very smooth, threaded barrel, accepts every ak 47 magazine, and includes great upgrades. 

This rifle includes:
-Aluminum Quad-Rail with 4 UTG Rail Protectors
-Folding Fore Grip With Storage Compartment  
-Aluminum 6 Position Stock Adapter With Storage Compartment
-ATI Strikeforce 6 Position Collapsable Stock With Recoil Pad and Removable and Adjustable Cheek Rest
-Ak 74 Style Muzzle Brake AND A Tapco Slant Brake
-AK Butt Stock Cleaning Kit With Spare Firing Pin (Kit fits inside aluminum stock adapter)
-Ak Cleaning Rod
-Brand New K-Var KV-04S Quick Release Scope Mount ($97.99 on their website)
-Original Wood Furniture and Hardware

title: For Sale:  NIB Ruger LCR .22LR
postcontent:
The Ruger LCR, (Lightweight Compact Revolver) represents one of the most significant new revolver designs in over a century. This small-framed, lightweight revolver consists of three main components: a polymer fire control housing, an aircraft quality aluminum monolithic frame, and an extensively fluted stainless steel cylinder. Each of these components give the LCR a unique advantage over traditional revolvers.

The lightweight, chemical-resistant polymer fire control housing contains the entire fire control mechanism, providing a tighter dimensional relationship of the components than if divided between a traditional grip frame and cylinder frame. The end result is that the fire control components are assembled with no hand fitting, resulting in a highly consistent product at an affordable price.

Firearm is factory new in box.
